name: Inventory
body:
### Welcome to Inventory Management.
This project that can be found here ( http://howto.oz-apps.com/2011/07/inventory-management-system-for-games.html ) and was written for CoronaSDK and can be adapted easily for Gideros Studio and will be updated soon.

### Authors and Contributors
Maintained by @JayantVarma from @OZApps

### Support or Contact
you can have a read on our other blogs
* http://howto.oz-apps.com
* http://LearnLua.oz-apps.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
